"Sharkey": "...That said, your Class does not appear to be Gunner."
"...If you want to learn how to fight, you will need to go to the Class Counter and change your Class to Gunner."
"...And don't forget to learn some Gunner Class Skills too."
"...For now, I'll just explain Gunner to you."
"...Gunner is a Class that excels at shooting enemies from a distance. It is notable for its high mid-air mobility."
"...Its most important Class Skill is called \"Chain Trigger\". Learn how to use it."
"...First, try using it in actual combat. I will give you a training assignment."
